item.title: Bond Traders Await Big Data Week Catalyst to Spark Yield Swings
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- A week of modest gains in the $30 trillion Treasury market is setting investors up for a trio of upcoming economic releases that stand to offer further reason to price in a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut in the coming months. Yields on short- to intermediate-dated benchmarks led th...
